artwork.Title: A Meeting Place on the Plinth
artwork.Ffordd: Y Senedd, Stryd Pen y Lanfa
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r ardal eistedd crwm yn rhoi lle clos i bobl eistedd a threulio amser ac mae wedi ei adeiladu o�r un llechi ag a ddefnyddir yn y Senedd i gyd.
artwork.description: The curved seating area provides an intimate space for people to spend time in and is constructed from the same Welsh slate that is used throughout the Senedd.

artwork.Title: A Private View
artwork.Ystyr: Sefwch y tu �l i�r delw efydd a mwynhewch yr olygfa hon drwy sff�r ddur gwrthstaen yr Eglwys Norwyaidd sydd wedi ei lleoli gyferbyn � Bae Caerdydd.
artwork.description: Stand behind the bronze figure and enjoy his view through the stainless steel sphere of the Norwegian Church located on the opposite side of Cardiff Bay.

artwork.Title: Adventurer's Quay Mosaic and Car Park Grilles
artwork.Teitl: Mosaig a Dellt Maes Parcio Cei�r Anturiwr
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/Adventurer's Quay Mosaic and Car Park Grilles.jpg

artwork.Title: All Hands
artwork.Ystyr: Mae �All Hands� wedi ei leoli ar lwybr hanesyddol Camlas Morgannwg ac mae�n darlunio�r gweithwyr camlas yn tynnu eu cychod yn eu blaen gyda rhaffau trymion.
artwork.description: Located on the path of the historic Glamorganshire Canal, 'All Hands' depicts the canal workers pulling their boats along with heavy ropes.

artwork.Title: Allegories of Literature, Calligraphy and Printing
artwork.Ffordd: Yr Hen Lyfrgell, Ynys yr Aes

artwork.Title: Allegories of Medicine, Law and Agriculture
artwork.Teitl: Alegor�au Meddyginiaeth, y Gyfraith ac Amaethyddiaeth

artwork.Title: Allegories of Study and Rhetoric
artwork.Ffordd: Yr Hen Lyfrgell, Heol y Drindod

artwork.Title: Angelina Street
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r rheiliau dur a�r platiau efydd yn adlewyrchu defnydd y caeau chwarae cyfagos ac wedi eu dylunio mewn cydweithrediad � phreswylwyr lleol a phlant ysgol.
artwork.description: The steel railings and bronze plaques reflect the use of the adjoining playing fields and were designed in collaboration with local residents and school children.

artwork.Title: Animal Wall
artwork.Ystyr: Yn wreiddiol roedd naw anifail ar y Wal ac roedd wedi ei lleoli y tu allan i Gastell Caerdydd. Ychwanegwyd chwe anifail newydd pan gafod ei symud i�w lleoliad presennol yn y 1920au.
artwork.description: The Wall originally consisted of nine animals and was located outside Cardiff Castle. Six new animals were added when it was moved to its current location in the 1920's.

artwork.Title: Antarctic 100 - Captain Scott Memorial
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r cerflun mosaig yn edrych allan dros y fan yn y Bae ble hwyliodd y Terranova, llong Capten Scott, allan o Gaerdydd yn 1910 ar ei mordaith angheuol i Begwn y De.
artwork.description: The mosaic sculpture overlooks the point in the Bay where Captain Scott's ship the Terranova set sail from Cardiff in 1910 on its ill-fated trip to the South Pole.

artwork.Title: Awen
artwork.Road: Welsh College of Music and Drama, North Road
artwork.Ffordd: Coleg Cerdd a Drama Cymru, Heol y Gogledd

artwork.Title: Bay Panels
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r pob panel teracota sydd wedi ei osod ar waelod deuddeg lamp stryd a leolir o gwmpas Bae Caerdydd yn darlunio agwedd wahanol o ddiwylliant Gymreig.
artwork.description: Located on the base of twelve street lamps around Cardiff Bay's waterfront, each terracotta panel illustrates a different aspect of Welsh culture.

artwork.Title: Beastie Benches
artwork.Ffordd: Parc y Glannau a Chei Britannia
artwork.Ystyr: Cafodd y naw mainc bric cerfiedig eu hysbrydoli gan y creaduriaid a ddisgrifir yng ngherdd Dylan Thomas �The ballad of the long legged bait�.
artwork.description: The nine carved brick benches were inspired by the creatures described in the Dylan Thomas poem 'The ballad of the long legged bait'.

artwork.Title: Billy The Seal
artwork.Ystyr: Wedi iddo gael ei achub o rwydi cwch pysgota a weithiai o Ddociau Caerdydd, bu �Billy' y morlo�n byw yn Llyn Parc Fictoria o 1912 tan ei farwolaeth yn 1939.
artwork.description: Having been rescued from the nets of a fishing boat operating out of Cardiff Docks, 'Billy' the Seal lived in Victoria Park Lake from 1912 until his death in 1939.

artwork.Title: Black Bridge
artwork.Ystyr: Roedd yr artistiaid yn gweithio gyda phobl ifanc o�r ganolfan gymuned leol i wella cyflwr y llwybr allweddol hwn rhwng cymunedau Adamsdown a Sblot.
artwork.description: The artists worked with young people from the local community centre to improve the condition of this key route between the communities of Adamsdown and Splott.

artwork.Title: Blue Flash, Power Box and Mesh Chips
artwork.Teitl: Fflach Las, Bocs P?er a Sglodion Rhwyll
artwork.Ystyr: Mae dylunio artistig wedi helpu i droi'r is-orsaf ddominyddol a hynod amlwg hwn yn dirnod cadarnhaol ac adnabyddus i'r ddinas.
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/Blue Flash, Power Box and Mesh Chips.jpg
artwork.description: Artistic design has helped turn this dominant and highly visible sub-station into a positive and recognisable landmark for the city.

artwork.Artist: Andrew Rowe, David Mackie and Heather Parnell
artwork.Title: Bute Street Works
artwork.Celfyddydwr: David Mackie, Andrew Rowe a Heather Parnell
artwork.Ystyr: Mae'r slabiau palfin a'r bolardiau dur sydd wedi eu lleoli ar hyd Bute Street yn cynrychioli chwe thema o'r gymuned leol, gan gynnwys: chwedlau lleol, tirnodau a masnach.
artwork.description: The paving slabs and steel bollards positioned along Bute Street represent six themes from the local community, including: local legends, landmarks and trades.

artwork.Title: C-Interludes
artwork.Ystyr: Mae darnau celf sydd wedi eu lleoli mewn pum man ar hyd Rhodfa Lloyd George, yn cyfleu natur morwrol yr ardal ac wedi eu haddurno � cherfluniau efydd fel pysgol a gwylanod.
artwork.description: Located at five points along Lloyd George Avenue, the artworks evoke the maritime nature of the area and are adorned with bronze sculptures including fish and seagulls.

artwork.Title: Cader Idris
artwork.Ystyr: Cafodd y cerflun gwenithfaen ei ysbrydoli gan fynyddoedd, llynnoedd a dyffrynnoedd Cymru a Chadair Idris yn benodol.
artwork.description: This sandstone sculpture was inspired by the mountains, lakes and valleys of Wales and in particular 'Cader Idris' in Snowdonia.

artwork.Title: Canal Park Entrance
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r pedwar panel a leolir ar lwybr hanesyddol Camlas Morgannwg yn adlewyrchu cloddio am lo yn Nyffrynoedd De Cymru a�i allforio o Ddociau Caerdydd.
artwork.description: Located on the path of the historic Glamorganshire Canal, the four panels reflect the mining of coal in the South Wales Valleys and its export form Cardiff Docks.

artwork.Title: Cardiff Central Station Mosaics
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r mosaigs dwyieithog hyn yn darlunio�r amrywiaeth o bobl wahanol sydd wedi gweithio yng Ngorsaf Ganolog Caerdydd a defnyddio�i gwasanaethau drwy gydol y ganrif ddiwethaf.
artwork.description: These bilingual mosaics depict the range of different people who have worked at Cardiff Centre Station and used its services over the course of the past century.

artwork.Title: Cargoes
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r gwaith celf yn cynnwys 21 cerflun sydd wedi eu lleoli ar yr adeiladau o gwmpas Cei'r F�r-Forwyn ac maent yn cynrychioli amrywiol rannau o�r gerdd �Cargoes� gan John Masefield.
artwork.description: The artwork consists of 21 sculptures which are located on the buildings around Mermaid Quay and represent various parts of the poem 'Cargoes' by John Masefield.

artwork.Title: Celtic Ring
artwork.Ystyr: Mae'r cylch yn nodi dechrau Taith y Taf sy'n 55 milltir rhwng Aberhonddu a Chaerdydd. Mae'r arwyneb gweadog yn cynnwys manylion gan gynnwys siartiau'r llanw sy'n gysylltiedig � Dociau Caerdydd.
artwork.description: The ring marks the start of the 55 mile Taff Trail between Brecon an Cardiff. It's textured surface contains maritime details including tidal charts associated with Cardiff's Docks.

artwork.Title: City Hall Clock Tower
artwork.Ffordd: Neuadd y Ddinas, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig

artwork.Title: Coal, Steel and Water
artwork.Ystyr: Wedi ei ysbrydoli gan hanes glofaol, dur a d?r yr ardaloedd. Mae�r pigynnau'n cynrychioli mastiau�r llongau ac mae�r darn canol yn cynnwys wagenni glo mewn rhes yn aros i gael eu dadlwytho.
artwork.description: Inspired by the areas history of coal, steel and water. The spikes represent the masts of the ships and the middle section contains coal trucks queuing to be unloaded.

artwork.Title: Compass Rose
artwork.Ystyr: "Mae�r mosaig gwenithfaen yn cofnodi alldaith Capten Scott i Begwn y De yn 1910. Mae�r arysgrif yn darllen fel hyn: ""To strive, to seek, to find and not to yield""."
artwork.description: "The granite mosaic commemorates Captain Scott's expedition to the South Pole in 1910. Its inscription reads: ""To strive, to seek, to find and not to yield""."

artwork.Title: Deep Navigation
artwork.Ystyr: Ar y�golofn�gyntaf mae enwau�r holl byllau glo De Cymru a oedd yn gweithio yn 1964.� Mae'r ail�golofn yn nodi�r porthladdoedd yr oedd Caerdydd yn allforio glo iddynt.
artwork.description: The first pillar includes the names of all of the South Wales coal mines that were operational in 1964. The second pillar identifies all of the ports that Cardiff exported coal to.

artwork.Title: Drift of the Curlews
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r haid o ylfinirod efydd wedi eu lleoli wrth ymyl Gwarchodfa Gwlypdir Bae Caerdydd ac maent yn adlewyrchu�r bywyd gwyllt llewyrchus yn yr ardal.
artwork.description: The group of bronze curlews are located next to the Cardiff Bay Wetlands Reserve and reflect the abundance of wildlife in the area.

artwork.Title: Drinking Fountain
artwork.Ystyr: Yn wreiddiol roedd y ffynnon yfed yn rhan o Neuadd y Dref yn Heol Eglwys Fair a chafodd ei hail-leoli pan chwalwyd yr adeilad yn 1914.
artwork.description: The drinking fountain originally formed part of the Town Hall located in St Mary Street and was relocated when the building was demolished in 1914.

artwork.Title: Events Arena
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r ardal wedi cael ei dylunio i ffurfio man perfformio awyr agored naturiol. Mae�r blociau cerrig a chyfuchliniau'r lleiniau glaswellt yn darparu man eistedd o gwmpas y llwyfan ganolog.
artwork.description: The area has been designed to form a natural outdoor performance space. The stone blocks and contours of the grass verges provide seating around a central stage.

artwork.Title: Falkland Islands War Memorial
artwork.Ystyr: Cofeb i ddynion Caerdydd a laddwyd wrth ymladd yn ystod Rhyfel y Malvinas yn 1982.
artwork.description: A memorial to the men of Cardiff who were killed in action during the Falkland Islands campaign in 1982.

artwork.Title: Fountain Canopy - Grange Gardens
artwork.Ystyr: Yn wreiddiol roedd ffynnon yfed o dan y canopi sy�n un o�r ddwy enghraifft sy�n weddill a roddwyd i�r ddinas yn gynnar yn y 1900au.
artwork.description: Originally containing a drinking fountain, this canopy is one of two remaining examples that was gifted to the city in the early 1900's.

artwork.Title: Fountain Canopy - Victoria Park
artwork.Ystyr: Yn wreiddiol roedd ffynnon yfed o dan y canopi sy�n un o�r ddwy enghraifft sy�n weddill a roddwyd i�r ddinas yn gynnar yn y 1900au.
artwork.description: Originally containing a drinking fountain, this canopy is one of two remaining examples that was gifted to the city in the early 1900's.

artwork.Title: From Pit to Port
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r gwaith celf yn dathlu�r holl w?r a gwragedd hynny a ffurfiodd ddolen yn y gadwyn rhwng cloddio am lo yn y cymoedd a�i allforio o Ddociau Caerdydd.
artwork.description: The artwork commemorates all of those men and women whom formed the link in the chain between the mining of coal in the valleys and it export from Cardiff Docks.

artwork.Title: Kitchener School Mosaic
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r mosaig wedi ei seilio ar yr hwyl gall blant ei gael yn y maes chwarae bod hi�n heulog neu�n ddiwrnod glawog.
artwork.description: The mosaic is based on the fun that children can have in the playground whether the sun is out or if it's a rainy day.

artwork.Title: Lampstandards
artwork.Ystyr: Cyfeiriad at strwythurau morwrol fel craeniau a mastiau yw�r goleuadau stryd cain hyn. Maent wedi eu lleoli ar hyd Glannau D?r Bae Caerdydd ym Masin y Rhath a Pharc Britania.
artwork.description: These elegant streetlamps reference maritime structures like cranes and masts. They are located along Cardiff Bays Waterfront at Roath Basin and Britannia Park.

artwork.Title: Landmark
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r casgliad hwn o siapau geometrig a wnaed o arwyddion traffig wedi creu tirnod nodedig sy�n cael ei alw�n �Magic Roundabout� yn lleol.
artwork.description: This collection of geometric shapes made from traffic signs has created a distinctive landmark that is locally referred to as the 'Magic Roundabout'.

artwork.Title: Landsea Square Water Feature
artwork.Ystyr: Yn dwt yng nghalon Bae Caerdydd, mae�r nodwedd d?r hwn yn ffurfio canolbwynt ar gyfer sgw�r cyhoeddus bychan.
artwork.description: Tucked away in the heart of Cardiff Bay, this water feature forms a central focal point to a small public square.

artwork.Title: Magistrates Court
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r mosaig naw metr o uchder hwn yn addurno Llys Ynadon Caerdydd. Mae�r ffigur cyfiawnder wedi ei amgylchynu gan symbolau sy�n cynrychioli trefn a chydbwysedd.
artwork.description: This nine metre high mosaic adorns Cardiff's Magistrates Court. The figure of justice is surrounded by symbols representing order and balance.

artwork.Title: Memorial to 614 Squadron
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r garreg las pennant yn nodi safle blaenorol Maes Awyr Caerdydd (Pengam) ac yn coffau Sgwadron Ategol y Llu Awyr Brenhinol 614 a wasanaethai yn ystod yr Ail Ryfel Byd.
artwork.description: The blue pennant stone marks the former site of Cardiff (Pengam) Airport and commemorates the Royal Auxiliary Airforce 614 Squadron who served during World War II.

artwork.Artist: Brian Fell (Mosaic by Shenstone and Butler)
artwork.Title: Merchant Seafarer's War Memorial
artwork.Celfyddydwr: Brian Fell (Mosaig gan Shenstone ac Butler)
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r cerflun yn cyfuno corff llong o fewn si�p wyneb heb fod o gyfnod arbennig. Y mae�n gofeb i�r Morwyr Masnachol o Dde Cymru a wasanaethodd yn ystod yr Ail Ryfel Byd.
artwork.description: The sculpture combines the hull of a ship with the shape of a timeless face. It is a memorial to the Merchant Seamen from South Wales who served during World War II.

artwork.Title: Mosaic - Near Mount Stuart Primary School
artwork.Teitl: Mosaig � Gerllaw Ysgol Gynradd Mount Stuart

artwork.Title: National Cycle Network Mileposts
artwork.Ystyr: Ceir pedwar gwahanol ddyluniad o garreg filltir. Yn y fersiwn hwn �Y Goeden Ffosil� ceir ffurf coeden haniaethol ac mae�n cynnwys amrywiaeth o ffosiliau sy�n darlunio treigl amser.
artwork.description: There are four different designs of milepost. This version 'The Fossil Tree' takes the form of an abstract tree and contains a range of fossils depicting the passage of time.

artwork.Title: Newtown Memorial Garden
artwork.Ystyr: Roedd Newtown, a gafodd ei chwalu yn 1966, yn gartref i gannoedd o w?r a gwragedd a ddaeth drosodd o�r Iwerddon i gwblhau�r gwaith o adeiladu Doc Bute.
artwork.description: Demolished in 1966, Newtown originally housed hundreds of men and women who came over from Ireland to complete the building of the Bute Dock.

artwork.Title: Palisade
artwork.Ystyr: Mae pwrpas ymarferol i�r cerflun dur gwrthstaen gloyw hwn sef cuddio a diogelu�r offer hydrolig ar gyfer gatiau loc Basin y Rhath gerllaw.
artwork.description: This polished stainless steel sculpture has the practical purpose of concealing and protecting the hydraulic equipment for the nearby Roath Basin lock gates.

artwork.Title: Panorama Stone
artwork.Ystyr: Mae pegiau efydd yn nodi cyfeiriad y cyrchfannau sy�n gysylltiedig � Chaerdydd, o Benarth gerllaw ac Ynys Echni i ardaloedd fel Nantes a Stuttgart.
artwork.description: Bronze pegs mark the direction of destinations that have links with Cardiff, from nearby Penarth and Flatholm through to areas such as Nantes and Stuttgart.

artwork.Title: People Like Us
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r cerflun yn dathlu�r bobl a oedd yn byw a gweithio yn nociau Caerdydd yn hwyr yn y 19 ganrif ac yn gynnar yn yr 20 ganrif.
artwork.description: The sculpture celebrates the people who lived and worked in Cardiff docks during the late 19th and early 20th century.

artwork.Title: Pigeon Wave
artwork.Ystyr: Yn seiliedig ar y cymeriadau sy�n byw yn yr adeilad, mae naw colomen yn eistedd mewn rhes uwch ben cloc yr orsaf reilffordd gan godi a fflapio'u hadenydd tra bo tr�n bach tegan yn rhedeg heibio.
artwork.description: Based on the characters that inhabit the building, nine pigeons sit in a row above the railway stations clock and rise and flap their wings as a small toy train runs by.

artwork.Title: Poetry and Music
artwork.Ffordd: Neuadd y Ddinas, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig

artwork.Title: Regarding Guardians of Art
artwork.Road: National Muesum and Gallery of Wales, Park Place

artwork.Title: Relief Sculpture
artwork.Ystyr: Uwch ben mynediad Ysgol Fferylliaeth Cymru Prifysgol Caerdydd mae cerflun sy'n dangos hen berson mewn toga yn estyn allan dros wyddonydd a nyrs.
artwork.description: Located above the entrance to the Cardiff University Welsh School of Pharmacy, the sculpture shows an elderly toga-clad person reaching out over a scientist and a nurse.

artwork.Title: Bowline Knot
artwork.Ystyr: Defnddiwyd i glymu llongau a chychod i'r dociau, mae'r cerflun efydd hwn yn adlewyrchu treftadaeth Bae Caerdydd fel un o borthladdoedd allforio glo mwyaf blaenllaw y byd.
artwork.description: Used to tie ships and boats to the dock, this bronze sculpture reflects Cardiff Bay's heritage as one of the worlds principal coal-exporting ports.

artwork.Title: Scott Memorial
artwork.Ystyr: Mae t?r y cloc yn coffau alldaith angheuol Capten Scott i Begwn y De yn 1910. Gellir gweld model o�i long y Terra Nova ar gopa�r t?r.
artwork.description: The clock tower commemorates Captain Scott's ill-fated expedition to the South Pole in 1910. A model of his ship, the Terra Nova can be seen at the top of the tower.

artwork.Title: Skyline
artwork.Ffordd: Heol Eglwys Fair / L�n y Felin

artwork.Title: Statue of Godfrey, First Viscount of Tredegar
artwork.Teitl: Cerflun o Godfrey, Is-Iarll Cyntaf Tredegar
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/Statue of Godfrey, First Viscount of Tredegar.jpg

artwork.Title: Statue of Lord Ninian Crichton Stuart
artwork.Teitl: Cerflun yr Arglwydd Ninian Crichton Stuart

artwork.Title: Statue of The Second Marquess of Bute
Statue of The Third Marquess of Bute
Street Grilles - National Assembly Building
artwork.Teitl: Dellt Strydoedd � Adeilad y Cynulliad Cenedlaethol
artwork.Ystyr: Gan ffurfio rhan annatod o ddyluniad yr adeiladau, mae'r griliau awyru hyn yn cynyddu mewn maint a chymhlethdod wrth iddynt agos�u at y brif fynedfa.
artwork.description: Forming an integral part of the buildings design, these ventilation grilles increase in size and complexity as they get closer to the main entrance.

artwork.Title: Stuttgart Stained Glass
artwork.Celfyddydwr: Yr Athro Hans Gottfried Von Stockhausen
artwork.Ystyr: Yn Neuadd Dewi Sant mae�gwydr lliw�a gyflwynwyd i�Gaerdydd gan bobl Stuttgart fel symbol o gyfeillgarwch rhwng y ddwy ddinas.
artwork.description: Located within St David's Hall, this stained glass was presented to Cardiff by the people of Stuttgart as a symbol of friendship between the two cities.

artwork.Title: Taff Trail Relief Map
artwork.Ystyr: Mae'r map tirwedd hwn yn dylunio Taith y Taf rhwng Caerdydd ac Aberhonddu. Fel rhan o b�r sy'n cyfateb �'i gilydd, mae'r ail ddarn celf i'w ganfod ar ddiwedd y daith yn Aberhonddu.
artwork.description: This relief map depicts the route of the Taff Trail between Cardiff and Brecon. Part of a matching pair, the second artwork can be found at the end of the trail in Brecon.

artwork.Title: The Sea Receiving the Severn
artwork.Teitl: Y M�r yn Derbyn yr Hafren
artwork.Ffordd: Neuadd y Ddinas, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig

artwork.Title: The Taff, the Rhymney and the Ely
artwork.Ffordd: Neuadd y Ddinas, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/The Taff, the Rhymney and the Ely.jpg

artwork.Title: Tide of Black Diamonds
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r llwybr cerdded yn dwyn ynghyd agweddau hanesyddol a chyfoes o economi�r ddinas ac yn symboleiddio (1) trawsgludo glo a (2) throsglwyddo data drwy gyfrwng rhwydweithiau o ffibrau optig.
artwork.description: The walkway draws together historic and contemporary aspects of the city's economy and symbolises (1) the transport of coal and (2) data transfer via fibre optic networks.

artwork.Title: Tidemark Seatwall
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r gyfres o farciau tebyg i ffosilau ar y wal yn adlewyrchu tregl amser. Mae�r gwaith celf yn cynnwys pennill morwrol a ysgrifennwyd mewn un deg saith o ieithoedd gwahanol.
artwork.description: The series of fossil-like markings along the wall reflect the passage of time. The artwork contains a maritime verse that is written in seventeen different languages.

artwork.Title: Triple Spout
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r gwaith celf wedi ei leoli mewn pydew dwfn si�p D a oedd yn cael ei ddefnyddio�n hanesyddol ar gyfer tafoli lefelau d?r yn y y Basn Hirgrwn cyfagos.
artwork.description: The artwork is located within a deep D shaped feeder pit that was historically used for balancing water levels in the adjacent Oval Basin.

artwork.Title: Union of Shop, Distributive and Allied Workers
artwork.Teitl: Undeb Gweithwyr Siopau, Dosbarthol a Chynghreiriol
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/Union of Shop, Distributive and Allied Workers.jpg

artwork.Title: Unity and Patriotism
artwork.Ffordd: Neuadd y Ddinas, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig

artwork.Title: Wales Millennium Centre - Building Fa�ade
artwork.Teitl: Canolfan Mileniwm Cymru - Ffas�d yr Adeilad
artwork.Ystyr: "Mae�r llythrennau mawr celtaidd yn llunio dwy arysgrif: ""CREU GWIR FEL GWYDR O FFWRNAIS AWEN"" ac ""IN THESE STONES HORIZONS SING""."
artwork.description: "The large Celtic lettering contains two inscriptions: ""CREU GWIR FEL GWYDR O FFWRNAIS AWEN"" (Truth is as clear as glass forged in the flames of inspiration) and ""IN THESE STONES HORIZONS SING""."

artwork.Title: Wales Millennium Centre - Door Furniture
artwork.Ystyr: Mae dolenni�r prif ddrysau yn seiliedig ar offerynnau cerdd. Mae�r patrwm ar y platiau gwthio yn deillio o�r crychdonni ar dywod gan y llanw o gwmpas arfordir Cymru.
artwork.description: The handles on the main doors are based on musical instruments. The push plates represent the ripples made in sand by the tides around the Welsh coastline.

artwork.Title: Wales Millennium Centre - Colourfall
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r gwaith gwydr mewn hwn yn rhaeadru o�r ystafelloedd digwyddiadau ar dop Canolfan y Mileniwm i lawr i�r siop goffi islaw.
artwork.description: This internal glasswork cascades from the function rooms at the top of the Millennium Centre down to the coffee shop below.

artwork.Title: Water Tower - Cardiff Bay
artwork.Ystyr: Wedi ei leoli ger y mynedfa i Plass Roald Dahl, mae�r t?r d?r 70troedfedd hwn wedi bod mewn rhaglenni Dr Who a Torchwood ar y teledu.
artwork.description: Located at the entrance to Roald Dahl Plass, this 70ft high water tower has featured in episodes of the TV series Dr Who and Torchwood.

artwork.Title: Water Towers - Callaghan Square
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r tyrau saffir las o aliminiwm wedi cael eu torri � laser gyda chynllun sy�n cyfleu d?r yn tasgu a sblasio.
artwork.description: The sapphire blue aluminium towers have been laser cut with a design that evokes the spray of splashing water.

artwork.Title: Welsh Dragon - City Hall
artwork.Ffordd: Neuadd y Ddinas, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig

artwork.Title: Wind Hedge
artwork.Ystyr: Er eu bod yn agos at Y Senedd, mae�r pum rhes cyfochrog o dri deg a dwy elfen wydr fertigol yn adleisio cynllun yr adeilad drwy fod yn dryloyw ac yn athraidd.
artwork.description: Although they enclose The Senedd, the five parallel rows of thirty-two vertical glass elements echo the design of the building by being both transparent and permeable.

artwork.Title: Wood Sculpture - Fox and Owl
artwork.Teitl: Cerflun Pren - y Cadno a'r Gwdih?

artwork.Title: Wood Sculpture - Otters and Red Kite
artwork.Teitl: Cerflun Pren � Y Dyfrgi a�r Barcud Coch

artwork.Title: Wood Sculpture - Roath Park BFG
artwork.Teitl: Cerflun Pren - Parc y Rhath BFG

artwork.Title: Memorial to Welsh Volunteers in the Spanish Civil War
artwork.Teitl: Cofeb i Wirfoddolwyr Cymru yn Rhyfel Cartref Sbaen
artwork.Ystyr: "Cafodd y gwaith celf coffaol hwn ei gyflwyno i'r gwirfoddolwyr Cymreig dros ryddid a ddiogelodd democratiaeth yn ystod Rhyfel Cartref Sbaen, 1936 - 1938"""
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/Memorial to Welsh Volunteers in the Spanish Civil War.jpg
artwork.description: "This commemorative artwork is ""Dedicated to the Welsh volunteers for liberty who defended democracy in the Spanish Civil War, 1936-1938"""

artwork.Title: 3 Ellipses for 3 Locks
artwork.Ystyr: Delwedd anamorffig yw�r gwaith celf sydd ddim ond yn gallu cael ei weld fel tri chylch cyflawn o un safle ar Forglawdd Bae Caerdydd.
artwork.description: The artwork is an anamorphic illusion and can only be viewed as three complete circles from a single vantage point on the Cardiff Bay Barrage.

artwork.Title: Cardiff Castle Clock Tower
artwork.Ystyr: Mae saith ffigur yn nh?r y cloc yn cynrychioli saith planed a�r duwiau Rhufeinig sy�n gyfatebol � nhw. Mae pob un yn dal eitem sy'n berthnasol i'w harwydd sodiac.
artwork.description: The clock tower contains seven figures that represent seven planets and their corresponding Roman Gods. Each figure holds an item relating to their sign of the zodiac.

artwork.Title: Mind's Eye
artwork.Ystyr: Wedi eu gwneud o 1000 o deils teracota a grefftiwyd yn unigol, rhaid sefyll union tu allan i fynedfa�r adeilad i werthfawrogi effaith cyflawn y patrwm.
artwork.description: Made from over 1000 individually crafted terracotta tiles, the full effect of the pattern only becomes apparent when standing directly outside the buildings entrance.

artwork.Title: Peace Sculpture
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r cerflun yn coffau�r rhai hynny a orymdeithiodd o Gaerdydd i RAF Greenham Common yn 1981 i wrthdystio yn erbyn defnyddio�r ardal ar gyfer lleoli taflegrau cruise.
artwork.description: The statue commemorates those who marched from Cardiff to RAF Greenham Common in 1981 to protest against the use of the area to site cruise missiles.

artwork.Title: Wales Millennium Centre - External Glass Manifestation
artwork.Teitl: Canolfan Mileniwm Cymru - Amlygiad Gwydr Allanol

artwork.Title: Water Quarter
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r cerflun tri medr o uchder wedi ei ffurfio o filoedd o lechi unigol a chafodd ei adeiladu�n gyfan gwbl � llaw a saif yn un o�r tri phwll d?r.
artwork.description: Formed from thousands of individual slates, the three metre high sculpture was constructed entirely by hand and stands within one of three water pools.

artwork.Title: Lighting Columns - Welsh Office
artwork.Ffordd: Heol y Coleg, Y Ganolfan Ddinesig

artwork.Title: Albany Primary School Mosaic and Railings
artwork.Teitl: Mosaig a Rheilins Ysgol Gynradd Albany

artwork.Artist: Andrew Rowe, David Mackie and Heather Parnell
artwork.Title: Gerddi Courtmead Gardens
artwork.Celfyddydwr: Andrew Rowe, David Mackie a Heather Parnell

artwork.Artist: Andrew Rowe, David Mackie and Heather Parnell
artwork.Title: Fitzhamon Embankment
artwork.Celfyddydwr: David Mackie, Andrew Rowe a Heather Parnell
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r pedwar cerflun hyn wedi eu hysbrydoli gan breswylwyr a phlant ysgol lleol o Riverside, ac maent yn cynrychioli hadau a sbeisys a ddefnyddir mewn ryseitiau lleol.
artwork.description: Inspired by local residents and school children from Riverside, these four sculptures represent seeds and spices used in local recipes.

artwork.Title: Welsh Millennium Milepost
artwork.Ystyr: Ceir pedwar gwahanol ddyluniad o garreg filltir wedi eu lleoli ar hyd y wlad. Mae�r fersiwn hyn yn seiliedig ar themau�r treftadaeth morwrol a diwydiannol.
artwork.description: There are four different designs of milepost located across the country. This version is based upon the themes of nautical and industrial heritage.

artwork.Title: Alliance
artwork.Ystyr: Gan gyfeirio at brif r�l y mor yn hanes economaidd y ddinas, mae'r cylch 'Alliance' yn cynnwys hylif gweladwy sy'n esgyn a disgyn gyda symudiad y llanw.
artwork.description: Referencing the major role of the sea in the city's economic history, 'Alliance's' hoop contains a visible liquid that rises and falls with the movement of the tide.

artwork.Title: Animal Wall (Century Wharf)
artwork.Ystyr: Mae�r wal yn cynnwys 1000 o flychau adar ac ystlumod sydd wedi creu cynefin newydd i fywyd gwyllt ar lannau Afon Taf.
artwork.description: The wall consists of 1000 bird and bat boxes that have created a new wildlife habitat along the banks of the River Taff.

artwork.Title: Chess in the Hayes
artwork.Ystyr: Mae'r pedwar Bwrdd Gwyddbwyll ar gael at ddefnydd unrhyw un a gallwch fenthyg darnau gwyddbwyll o'r Ganolfan Groeso gerllaw yn yr Hen Lyfrgell.
artwork.description: The four Chess Tables are available for anyone to use and chess pieces can be borrowed from the nearby Tourist Information Centre in the Old Library.

artwork.Title: Gren Sculpture
artwork.Ffordd: Adeilad Media Wales, Heol y Parc

artwork.Title: Medieval Town Wall
artwork.Ystyr: Wedi ei leoli ar y lwybr Wal y Dref Ganoloesol, mae'r gweithiau celf hyn yn cyfeirio at dreftadaeth hanesyddol Caerdydd gan gynnwys ei r�l fel canolfan fasnach a phorthladd masnach.
artwork.description: Located on the path of the Medieval Town Wall, these artworks reference Cardiff's history and heritage including its roles as a trading centre and trading port.

artwork.Title: Post Secrets
artwork.Ystyr: Wedi�i leoli mewn 12 lleoliad ar hyd Yr Aes, mae�r bolardiau hyn yn cynnwys bydoedd bychan tri dimensiwn ynddyn nhw. Edrychwch drwy�r twll i weld y tu mewn iddynt.
artwork.description: Situated at 12 locations along The Hayes, these bollards contain miniature three dimensional worlds within them. Look through the hole to see inside.

artwork.Title: Statue of Sir Tasker Watkins VC
artwork.Teitl: Cerflun o Syr Tasker Watkins VC

artwork.Title: The Spending Time Machine and the Triphid
artwork.Teitl: Y Peiriant Amser Gwario a'r Triphid
artwork.URL: http://isharemaps.cardiff.gov.uk/ishare/images/art/The Spending Time Machine and the Triphid.jpg

artwork.Title: Without Place
artwork.Ystyr: Yn wreiddiol roedd Heol Charles yn stryd breswyl brysur � siopau, swyddfeydd bywiog ac amrywiaeth o fasnach a gwasanaethau. Mae Without Place yn rhoi arlliw o orffennol diwylliannol Heol Charles.
artwork.description: Originally a busy residential street with bustling shops, offices and a range of trades and services, Without Place provides a trace of Charles Streets past cultural history.
